com.complexible.common.protocols.client

Interface ClientFactory<T extends Client>


  • public interface ClientFactory<T extends Client>

    Factory interface for creating clients corresponding to a protocol.

    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    0.8
    Author:
    Michael Grove

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createClient()
      Create a new SNARL protocol client for connecting to an embedded server
      T createClient(InetSocketAddress theAddress, boolean theSecure)
      Create a new client for connecting to the specified remote server

    • Method Detail

      • createClient

        T createClient()
                              throws ConnectException
        Create a new SNARL protocol client for connecting to an embedded server
        Returns:
        a new SNARL 'local' client.
        Throws:
        ConnectException - if the client could not connect to the embedded server

      • createClient

        T createClient(InetSocketAddress theAddress,
             boolean theSecure)
                              throws ConnectException
        Create a new client for connecting to the specified remote server
        Parameters:
        theAddress - the address of the server to connect to
        theSecure - whether or not to use SSL when connecting to the server
        Returns:
        a new client
        Throws:
        ConnectException - if there was an error connecting to the remote server
